message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a valuable piece, and I believe this price reflects its worth.  Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $950,000. This is the maximum amount I am willing to pay. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I understand your position, I'm not able to go that low. How about we split the difference at $1,075,000? This allows both of us to make a fair deal. Let me know if that's acceptable.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I've given it some thought and am willing to increase my offer to $1,025,000. I believe this price is fair for both of us considering the value of the product. I hope you'll find this proposal acceptable.
